dct_description_sm: Relief shown by gradient tints, shading, and spot heights. Depths shown by gradient tints. Physical map showing international, state, and provincial boundaries, military demarcation line near the 38th parallel, roads, railways, and part of Great Wall of China. In upper left margin: 1:3,000,000. Includes glossary and note.
dct_publisher_sm: [Seoul] : National Geography Institute : Distributed by the Korean Information Service of the Government Information Agency, [1998]
